Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: The service was excellent. The boys were outstanding. The drinks were awesome. The food was just yummy and by far the best place we ate in Amsterdam.we just loved the atmosphere there.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Just ok. Nothing special and wouldn't go out of my way. Liked the decor, seating and the friendly staff but the menu is meh....tried fried prawns with rice, massaman curry with fries (why would there be thin fries with a curry?!) And the …

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: We had a great night here. The food is a nice mix of European and Asian (Thai) and the staff is helpful and reasonably efficient. We'll be back.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Excellent Asian restaurants, a few steps away from Dam square! Cosy atmosphere, tasty curry and friendly staff, makes a great combo for a lovely evening with colleagues.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: East meets west menu. The east were more to Chinese than Thai ... well, at least those that we ordered. Well prepared & delicious. The high ceiling dining hall is at the back portion, the front is a bar, serving Heineken, Affligem & such. Feel free to write a postcard (provided), and they'll deliver for free. Proost!

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Cosy place with a mix of Dutch and Eastern food. Friendly service.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Pretty expensive and not a lot of options. However, the food was good in quantity and quality. A pity that I paid 10 euros for a small chocolate cake, ruined with a lot of unwanted decorative additions.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text:
This is not a restaurant with East meets West concept, but rather two separate menus, so you can choose the cuisine you prefer.
The food was good, especially the dessert - mango sticky rice.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: The location and the inside ambiance is good but the food was quite disappointing considering the high price. Beef and chicken were quite dry and my dish had very little taste. We had to pay for the water even though we specifically asked for tap water. The positive note was the soup which was very tasty.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Very tasty Tom GA Kai! The place was full when we arrived but the waiters served our table fast anyway.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text:
Great food and nice atmosphere. Service is ok, fast and friendly.
It was not very crowded, that's why lot of friends of the waiters were gathered around the bar, making lot of noise and not considering the comfort of guests. …

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: A mix between Western and Asian food in an atmospheric setting right in the city center of Amsterdam.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Nice decoration and cozy ambiance. The staff was friendly and spoke fluent english. The food and drinks were absolutely delicious   : we had spring rolls and the crispy fried beef topped with their homemade lemonade.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Visited here with my Thai partner and we both loved the food. The restaurant was nice enough to allow us to choose from the dinner menu at lunch time so we had more choice and the food was lovely. I ordered the green curry and it was tasty …

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Lovely setting, average food

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Amazing spot in the centre. As a spicy-dishes enthousiast, I really enjoyed the curries. It's great for groups, and also great options for people who are not into Asian food. Will definitely come back here!

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Very nice staff and nice food. They did however remove the Thai-Dutch fusion portion of their menu, which I found disappointing. Last year I enjoyed their mussels dish, hope they bring it back.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Felt a bit excluded on a table at the front rather than the busier back, where you can see the bar etc. But, really good food. The chicken was a big portion, with plenty of rice, and tasted really good, with a lasting zing, and the wagyu …

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Good service and fair food, but nothing special. If you want traditional Thai food I'd recommend you look elsewhere. The menu is split between American style dishes (burgers, ribs etc) and Thai. The selection of either is rather limited.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: A nice enough place; if you're looking for somewhere a bit more classy than the cafes and proeflokaals then I'd recommend it, but the beer selection is quite limited, and the atmosphere on a Friday night wasn't quite what we were looking …

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Me and my friend enjoyed a variation of curries, which were tasty and aromatic. We had a couple of ginger beers and Aperol Spritz as well. Nothing out of the ordinary. Friendly staff, reasonably priced, great for a quick dinner.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text:
Adam & Siam is an excellent Thai restaurant.
It doesn't look like an Asian restaurant but the food is excellent and really spicy if you want to eat spicy food. …

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Eating outside ( if weather is good) in the middle of Rokin square, tasty food.  We tried the Thai menu, and we were all really happy with that. Prices around 20-25 € per person

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: A bit pricy for the quality of dishes you get. I mean curry was fine but then they charge additional 5 euro if you need more rice. Really? You order 19 EUR dish and they can't give you free bowl of rice? Chicken dish my wife got was quite …

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Food was really good when it arrived! We waited 40 minutes for a club sandwich and a Cobb salad. Lovely,friendly staff and great place to sit outside and people watch!

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: I had a nice pad thai there. Good service and  cosy place.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Lovely inside and good food

Review Text: They have great food but service is a bit slow. They charge too much for what they serve.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Food was decent but it took forever to come through - we ordered, it took 15mins to bring out our starters but then an hour+ to bring out our mains even asking twice where it is... I don't think I'd recommend this place...

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text:
Waitress woman left us a menu, 10 mins later when she came to ask our order, she said its wrong menu and handed another one, left without even saying a sorry.
Also too loud music for a restaurant..

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Look, i am sure that the burgers and sandwiches are great. But that is not why i am here. Because would u really go to a place nameD "Adam & SIAM" for burgers? No. U would go here for thaifood or some fusion. Especially when this is …

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Great food! The atmosphere was inviting.  After a few hours of sightseeing it was great to sit outside and relax.  People watching is must...

Review Text: Great service, great location, but the burger with fries was one of the worst I've had in a restaurant. It also cost me 15€

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: The food and the atmosphere were nice but the service was truly terrible, they took a long time to serve us and at the end when we asked to split the bill they were very rude and unfriendly.

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Great Thai food! Very friendly waiters and fair pricing for the city center of Amsterdam. Can only reccomend!

Name: Adam & Siam
Review Text: Service very slow....they like to chat a lot with  special guests and not taking care of all. Takes all very long...to order food about 30 minutes to get food about 3/4 of an hour...only because they standing around...and not so busy...but food is good
